Messages.Author: Lorenz Johannes Linhardt
Messages.Content: Thank you everyone for voting. The assignments are as follows. ------------------------------------------------------------ 22.05.2024        Laurenz Julian Rasche         "Layer-Wise Relevance Propagation: An Overview" Supervisor: Lorenz Linhardt l.linhardt@tu-berlin.de 05.06.2024        Noah Kamangar "Are Large Language Models Post Hoc Explainers?" Supervisor: Stefan Blücher bluecher@tu-berlin.de 05.06.2024        Julian Alexander Dralle "Why should I trust you?" Explaining the predictions of any classifier Supervisor: Stefan Blücher bluecher@tu-berlin.de 12.06.2024        Konstantin Pissarsky "This Looks Like That: Deep Learning for Interpretable Image Recognition" Supervisor: Lorenz Linhardt l.linhardt@tu-berlin.de 19.06.2024        Sayed Mohammad Vakilzadeh Hatefi "From attribution maps to human-understandable explanations through Concept Relevance Propagation" Supervisor: Lorenz Linhardt l.linhardt@tu-berlin.de  19.06.2024        Yuxin Xue "Neural Additive Models: Interpretable Machine Learning with Neural Nets" Supervisor: Lorenz Linhardt l.linhardt@tu-berlin.de TBD        Jakob Balasus TBD Supervisor: TBD ------------------------------------------------------------ If you are not on the list but would still want to participate, please contact me with your preferred date & topic. Likewise, if you are missing a topic/date and haven't contacted me yet. Missing entries will be updated as soon as I have the information.  Have a nice weekend!

Messages.Author: Lorenz Johannes Linhardt
Messages.Content: Hello everyone,  I would be grateful if you could take some time and fill out the evaluation form for the Explainable ML Seminar: https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=Y72E7  Thank you!

Messages.Author: Lorenz Johannes Linhardt
Messages.Content: Everyone who held a presentation, please send me you matriculation number to l.linhardt@tu-berlin.de Thank you!

Messages.Author: Lorenz Johannes Linhardt
Messages.Content: Hello everyone,  as no one signed up for today's date, we will not meet today. The first presentation will be next week.  Best, Lorenz

Messages.Author: Lorenz Johannes Linhardt
Messages.Content: Apologies for the delayed start of the paper/date selection polls. You should now be able to select your preferred papers/dates.

Messages.Author: Lorenz Johannes Linhardt
Messages.Content: Just to confirm: the seminar is combinable with Deep Learning 2.
